Claim: "All young people are wearing red shirts."
Referring expressions: young people, red shirts  People, something
Formula: (exists a (exists b (IsYoung(a) and IsWearingRedShirt(b))) & (forall e (forall f (forall g ( IsYoung(e) ->  IsCarrying(f,g))))) & (forall j (forall h (forall i ( IsCarrying(h,i) ->  IsYoung(j)))))) -> (exists c (exists d (IsCarrying(c,d))))
